reviewText: I really love the Game: season one and two. I was very disappointed when CW cancelled the show but now that I have the DVD I can watch it all of the time. Thanks to Amazon.com. I am anxious for season 3 and 4 to be released. I really love this show! Charisse W. Washington, DC
I just love this show. I pre-ordered, & Amazon dropped the price by a few dollars by the time they shipped it out, and charged me the lower price. Great!

Just when I thought season 1 was on fire, season 2 gets even hotter!  If you don't have this DVD, I suggest you not hesitate in getting a copy of this dvd.  Of course, some of the material is adult themed, so do not view while small children are around. But the show is so real you get sucked in and you find that you can't help but to watch.  You will not be disappointed, worth every penny, loved every second of this dvd.  This season will definitely end with you thirsting for more....

The game was on.  Just brought it and have already viewed it five times.  Ms. Robinson is in rare form.  And the Irv Smitt character too funny.
Folk need to send comments to the producers to keep this show going.  I'm surprised at Kelsy Grammer, he had a real cash cow with this one.  Girlfriends went on too long for my taste.
All I can say is "When is Season 3 coming out?"  Even my dog loves this show!!!

OMG... I just finished watching the 2nd season of The Game and I cant not wait for Season 3 to come out on DVD. I love the show so much and I can not wait to see what happens next. I hope they bring the show back on tv and start a new season... :)
Case is broken. Was not satisfied

If you loved the first season then you will also love this one too. Excellent acting, plot, writers, it makes you feel as though everything is real even though its all fiction. I love this show man. I have all 3 seasons on dvd and am planning on getting the forth season.
I really enjoyed The Game(The 2nd Season) TV series.  I have purchased other seasons of The Game and I found this was the cheapest one I bought.

i love this show.. it was the only show that has all black cast that was still good... other than other shows like 90's where most of good black sitcoms where all of anything bt the greatest... i love it (moesha 1996-2001) and the fresh prince of bel-air (1990-1996) and its mom and dad tv show (girlfriends 2000-2008) this is a must own tv dvd must have if your into black shows with good acting and story lines other than moesha fresh prince and girlfriens... season 4 will air in 2011 on bet.. after the cw stop the show back in may of 2009.

I am a big fan of this series, but I was let down when I discovered that the DVD version don't have the original music that was played on the show. I think some of the most popular scenes from this show were only enhanced because of the music they chose for a particular scene fit like a glove.

This season was even more entertaining than the 1st & made me wish that I had supported this show while it was on air!

The season kicks off with the aftermath of Melanie discovering Derwin's betrayal.  They break up, kinda makeup then break up FOR REAL.  Each begins a new relationship but are they really over each other?  Melanie struggles to reclaim her identity and stand on her own while Derwin becomes a break out star and outplays Jason to become Malik's "go to" receiver.  After he & Melanie split he also begins to enjoy the perks that come with being a star athlete.

Meanwhile Jason & Kelly's marriage continues to deteriorate as he takes drastic measures to keep his spot on the team while Kelly tries to establish her independence.

Malik continues to "ball out of control" after moving to his own home and he & momager, Tasha part ways professionally after she fails to handle a p/r nightmare.  Tasha moves on to a management firm but has a hard time dealing with the "good ol boys" network.  She does however make a love connection with one of her co-workers, Rick Fox (yes, THAT Rick Fox who is surprisingly good in this role).

Oh, by the way - the Sabres make the playoffs again but to those who haven't seen it yet, I won't reveal the outcome.

This season also had a fair amount of excellent cameo appearances from the likes of Chad Johnson (hysterical as himself on a very bad date with Melanie), Serena Williams, Lil Kim, Tavis Smiley, Darryl 'Chill' Mitchell and finally Robin Givens (as the one who breaks Malik's heart).

Really excellent show that is worth the purchase - my only gripe is that the price point is a little high so wait for the sale then grab a copy!

The Game TV series is bad as hell!! (The good kinda bad) =P  DVD's are great, and I just read on March 15th, on AOL Black Voices that BET FINALLY struck a deal with Paramount to develop NEW episodes of the show!! I PRAY this is true!!!
I always purchase products from amazon and the price is great and the product is high quality. will shop at amazon again in the future.

Due to various work schedules, I finally got a chance to put the entire series of The Game in its complete sequence... The 1st & 2nd seasons have been like a bag of "chips" You just can't eat just one., I'm still scraping the bag for crumbs, I'm "jonesing" for season 3,.. Tia Mowry's finesses her craft to top notch perfection, The whole ensemble takes you on a trip and makes you want to jump back in line to ride again.. The celebrities musicians, athlete, appearances were smoothly casted and easily written in, male or female... "Music Soul Child" even has acting chops...
Love it
it
